attributes.title: APT Detection Dashboard
attributes.description: Real-time monitoring of Advanced Persistent Threat indicators
attributes.panelsJSON: [{"version": "8.15.0", "gridData": {"x": 0, "y": 0, "w": 24, "h": 15, "i": "1"}, "panelIndex": "1", "embeddableConfig": {"title": "Attack Timeline"}, "type": "visualization", "id": "apt-timeline-viz"}, {"version": "8.15.0", "gridData": {"x": 24, "y": 0, "w": 24, "h": 15, "i": "2"}, "panelIndex": "2", "embeddableConfig": {"title": "Threat Score Distribution"}, "type": "visualization", "id": "threat-score-pie"}, {"version": "8.15.0", "gridData": {"x": 0, "y": 15, "w": 48, "h": 20, "i": "3"}, "panelIndex": "3", "embeddableConfig": {"title": "MITRE ATT&CK Technique Coverage"}, "type": "visualization", "id": "mitre-attack-table"}, {"version": "8.15.0", "gridData": {"x": 0, "y": 35, "w": 24, "h": 15, "i": "4"}, "panelIndex": "4", "embeddableConfig": {"title": "Geographic Threat Map"}, "type": "visualization", "id": "geo-threat-map"}]
